comment: Great coffee but WiFi was slow today.
response: Thank you for your feedback! We've upgraded our WiFi service.

comment: The chai latte was perfect and the staff was very friendly.
response: Thank you for your kind words! We're glad you enjoyed your experience.

comment: The quiche was a bit cold.
response: We apologize for the cold quiche and have addressed this with our kitchen staff.

comment: I love the new seasonal blend!
response: We're thrilled to hear you enjoy our new blend!

comment: Long wait time today and the coffee was not as hot as usual.
